items.title: Global funds view Indian stocks as a top hedge against AI risks
items.description: With the AI frenzy fading and India’s stock valuations falling back near their five-year average after sharply trailing peers this year, the consumption-driven economy is back in favor

items.title: Zepto said to plan filing for $500 Million India IPO next week
items.description: The 10-minute delivery platform’s offering is expected to include a fresh issue as well as secondary share sales by existing investors, with proceeds earmarked for expansion

items.title: Bitcoin drops below $86,000 while sinking toward year’s lows
items.description: Bitcoin dropped below $86,000 for the first time in two weeks with investor sentiment weakening as the largest cryptocurrency slips deeper into bear market territory.

items.title: White House is considering reclassifying marijuana to ease restrictions on the drug | CNN Politics
items.description: President Donald Trump said Monday that the White House is “very strongly” considering signing an executive order to reschedule marijuana to a lower drug classification, which would ease federal restrictions.

items.title: The solution to America’s affordability problem might be broken, too | CNN Business
items.description: The best way to fix Americans’ cost-of-living problem is to give workers bigger raises, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said last week.
